Generation VI.X: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
Generation VI.Y: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

Generation VIII.Sword: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon's electric moves.
Generation VIII.Shield: The sun powers this Pokémon's electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 6 , Giant's Mirror Rolling Fields , East Lake Axewell , Lake of Outrage , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 6 , Giant's Mirror Rolling Fields , East Lake Axewell , Lake of Outrage , Giant's Mirror , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
